title: Yasuo theorys
body:
ok look most of you will either jump out of your seats at this or lose the will to live but in the who kill yasuo's master  theory it seems every one recons its riven but what if it was some one else entirely 
I propose the murderer of yasuo's master was Kennen his title is the heart of the tempest he is an assassin bye trade (ninja and assassin are the same thing) and yasuo's Q is steel tempest and in the lore of Kennen, Shen and Akali they kill indiscriminately to keep order so what if Kennen killed yasuo's master because his attacks are all techniques and they are wind and storm related

replies.body: I understand that but in rive was not connected to yasuo but actually varus and Kennen may have killed yasuo's master to stop him from teaching the wind technique to others being its so powerful consider it  and also Kennen is devoted to keeping order no matter the cost

1) Yasuo was the only person to master the technique, and it was said to be very difficult to use, it is very unlikely the another will be able to learn these skills again anyway.
2) Kennen , Shen or Akali wouldn't kill one of their Ionian people just to keep order. Even if they killed Yasuo's master to stop others from learning technique, they would still have to go after Yasuo as he would be able to teach someone else, and again very difficult to learn and use the wind technique.

Kennen does however serve Ionia, and is possible that he could be helping to catch Yasuo along with everyone from Yasuo's old home.

assassin: bye trade
trade: bye assassin

I dont think that Kennen would kill someone like Yasuo's master unless the master was connected something bigger, like secretly being one of Zed's followers. The most concrete theory is that it wasn't Riven, but someone who was trained by and with the same techniques that Riven was.
